trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGYR106_05008_RHODINA_000_000<tab>Well, well, what have we here? I thought I knew all the prominent trades<var 08 E905 ((women)) ((men)) /var> who pass through Solution Nine. Come to sign a contract, I trust?

TEXT_KINGYR106_05008_RHODINA_000_001<tab>You needn't fuss yourself over the details─the arrangement is blissfully simple. You provide me with product, and I compensate you for said product with scrips. A <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of your expertise must surely recognize such a lucrative offer when they hear one.

TEXT_KINGYR106_05008_RHODINA_000_002<tab>In truth, it was the Turali who first introduced me to the many conveniences of trade with scrips. A system brought to them by a tradeswoman by the name of Rowena. But that is neither here nor there.

TEXT_KINGYR106_05008_RHODINA_000_003<tab>You will be well paid for your contributions─with scrips, naturally─and your earnings can in turn be used to purchase any of our wares that strike your fancy. So, what do you say?
TEXT_KINGYR106_05008_RHODINA_000_004<tab>Splendid! Simply splendid. And lest you worry, there will be no quotas to speak of. You need only make deliveries when inspiration strikes!
TEXT_KINGYR106_05008_RHODINA_000_006<tab>Here's to a most beautiful and profitable partnership! I very much look forward to doing business with you.
TEXT_KINGYR106_05008_RHODINA_000_007<tab><sigh> What I wouldn't give for a capable trades<var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var>. Now how am I to move all this merchandise?
TEXT_KINGYR106_05008_SYSTEM_000_008<tab>In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 90 or above.
